resources.string:
Wordle is a word guessing game based on Wordle that tasks the player with correctly selecting a random five-letter word. You only get six tries to guess the word. 

> For a letter in the word and in a correct spot, the tile will turn green
 
> For a letter in the word but at the wrong spot, the tile will turn yellow
 
> For a letter not in the word at any spot, the tile will turn grey
 
In Better Wordle, the are 3 game modes you can select From: 1) Daily 2) Adventure 3) Journey. Also, you can use items as a help! 

Please Enjoy!
